message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make a good business decision.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal, but $11,000 just isn't feasible for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, how about $13,000?  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can make this work.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $12,500. That's the highest I can go.
